Text: Gayton le Wold is a village and civil parish in the East Lindsey district of Lincolnshire, England.
Triplets:<Gayton le Wold
1:
--------------------
Text: Gayton le Wold:  It lies 6 mi west from Louth, 3 mi north from Donington on Bain, and to the south of the A157.
